name: Radio.Play
description:
Radio.Play is a result of our exploration with branching narrative and radio drama. In this fully voiced prototype the player is able to follow a story from multiple perspectives across two conversations using a fully* functional radio receiver.

We are experimenting with power dynamics, agency, and voyeurism as videogame conceits meet the real world. While none of this content will be in our complete game, we want to expand on these themes and find different exciting spaces to explore.

This game is primarily audio focused  and we recommend playing with the best audio available to you. That said if the best audio available is laptop speakers or earbuds, you should still be able to enjoy yourself :)
